Articles.Content:
I backstabed you and take the hills. 

My Control Points. 

Also, I sapped the new page. (I'm not a good Spy)

**Edited <time datetime="2022-03-13T13:04:06Z" title="03/13/2022 01:04  PM" data-short="2 yr">March 13, 2022</time> by Abel101126**

Uninstalled Team Fortress 2 and Steam, locked down my internet for good reasons.

Now, i have my House Hill, which is much more important.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-03-13T13:05:42Z" title="03/13/2022 01:05  PM" data-short="2 yr">March 13, 2022</time> by Venusian Explorer**

I make a hobbit hole in the house hill.

My hobbit hole in the house hill.
The holebbit has found a nice golden ring.
[@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/) starts muttering about his precious and saying "It's my Hill you nasty Holebbitses"

I stabbed you [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/)and take the hill.

My (Blu) control point again.

....Aaaaand I backstab you. [Kazotsky kick}

THE CONTROL POINT IS BEING CAPTURED
It's captured by trolls. It's now a ControLL Point.
Sturmpanzer IIs on their way. Their 15cm armament easily destroy the trolls. HAHA

I sapped the Sturmpanzers and take the control point.

I called 10,000 engis to defend the control point.

Enough was enough, i erase Team Fortress 2 from this Megamultiverse, and replaced it with some tacos and doritos.

My 10,000 Doritos and Tacos. And a Circle.

Things get swapped.   

10,000 Doros and Tacitos.

The multiverse is shattering, now it's doors and tachos.

Car parts Hill.
Carpathian Hills. A lot of them.

I create an multiverse, inside of it was Team Fortress 2. 

My TF2 hill.

TF2 hill collapses into a singularity.

My new hill.
The tf2less hill.
The TF2more hill.

Camp fire.

Smores Hill.
Smaug Underhill.

Bomb hill.

My nonexistent hill.
Dwarf Palace Nohill
Hobbiton?
No, Erebor.

Iron Man comes and destroy the hill. 

Stark's destroyed hill.
